Player History
Injured on 5/15/1975 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/14/1976 with a Bruised Heel, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/7/1977, off Jerry Koosman (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/20/1977, off John Hiller (LA)...
Traded from Philadelphia to Texas on 2/10/1978 (Going to PHI: P L. Colson. Going to TEX: SS R. Smalley III)...
Injured on 5/7/1978 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Injured on 7/14/1978 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1981, hitting .385 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 5/26/1982 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/17/1983 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/9/1984 to a 3-year deal worth $7,180,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1985, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 6 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against California on 8/15/1985...
